Post.title: Vue Composition API
Post._content:
> https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/408272742 ## React React 19 Hooks API class **** Vue Function-based API RFC Composition API Vue3 React Composition API ## **1.1 Composition API ** Vue 3 Vue 2.x API **1.2 ** ![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-3215832798dad4d85252c140e509f445_r.jpg) Composition API `setup` `data` `methods` setup 2.x `this.xx` `setup` `setup` **1.3 ** ![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-7889c66d30a72bf92842103cf92ed84e_r.jpg) `setup` `useMouse` `useMouse` `x``y` Component `useMouse` `x``y` Mixins **1.4 ** ![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-7e01ef06f0e5e71970a6f98dcc5a610f_r.jpg) `useDark` `useToggle` toggle `useDark` `usePreferredDark` `useLocalStorage` ![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-1f58c63c4fccaffaa58660947892808a_r.jpg) `useLocalStorage` SessionStorage LocalStorage `useStorage``usePreferredDark` `window.matchMedia` `useMediaQuery` `useEventListener` [VueUse](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//github.com/vueuse/vueuse). Composition API RichTextPanel .vue ## API **2.1 setup** `setup` API `beforeCreate` `created` `onBeforeCreate` `onCreated` `setup` 1. `props` 2. `context`attrsslotsemit datacomputedmethods property **2.1.1 ** ![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ed3d1aa04bf9bf33e9878a0d935fb074_r.jpg) Babel Plugin JSX[feat: add @vue/composition-api support #142](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//github.com/vuejs/jsx/pull/142) **2.1.2 getCurrentInstance** `getCurrentInstance()` `setup` ![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-2219ce295be181f25efcf766f103d15b_r.jpg) **2.2 reactive** `Vue.observable(obj)` property data **2.2.1 ** reactive() **2.2.2 ** ![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-bde37e9bd232fafb93168b55251367b9_r.jpg) **2.3 ref** `.value` reactive property reactiveVue ref ![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-19e7df03e22381ebc37428bf17a8e594_r.jpg) **2.3.1 .value ** 1. ref 2.`watch` ref ![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-61b795e0a933eaba882ebe38e65d3acd_r.jpg) 3. reactive() / readonly() ref ![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6b5120ec665ba0e9330220c967ac023a_r.jpg) `Array` `Map` ref **2.3.2 unrefref ** ref `ref.value` `.value` `Ref | number` unref ![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-be644447a3adfae139ccb07863b4fe30_r.jpg) **2.3.3 ref** ref `ref()` ref `return ref(param)` ref ref **2.3.4 ES6 ** ref ![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-fb83022e342cde7e017a54e710b8d6b6_r.jpg) **2.3.5 this.$refs ** DOM VNode `ref` ref VNode ref DOM / ref ![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c08e93238d9074b4e78284dcca4b94cb_r.jpg) **2.4 toRefs** property value ref `reactive` `props` ![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-e1550002c1ead321c4dde992c78f944c_r.jpg) **2.5 computed** getter **** ref ![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b2e6f76a4f4265e182212f3dff7b8ab4_r.jpg) get set **** ref ![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-c7dadc1902029f1fa98537e6c13744d3_r.jpg) **2.6 watch** * getter ref * watch ![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b0556885105bd72c7b0b6ea131af826a_r.jpg) **2.6.1 ** `watch()` ![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-75541dc512f2994a4ac1719df0e23a64_r.jpg) `watch()` `setup()` watcher **2.6.2 effect** watcher * * watcher ![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-f81961ecde2ab5d1edecc76cb51940b3_r.jpg) ## **3.1 Class API Function API Composition API** Vue RFC [Class API](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//github.com/vuejs/rfcs/pull/17) [Function-based Component API](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//github.com/vuejs/rfcs/pull/42) FP [Composition API](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//github.com/vuejs/rfcs/pull/78) Reactivity **3.2 ** 2.x API * * * * / * TypeScript * Class API TS API TS * * API named ES export tree-shaking API * API setup class / **3.3 2.x ** Vue 2.x API * Mixins * (Higher-order Components, aka HOCs) * Renderless Components scoped slots / * * mixin mixinHOC * Composition API setup * * mixin HOC props * * * HOC Renderless Components * **3.4 React Hooks** Composition API React Hooks React Hooks Vue `setup()` `setup()` Composition API React Hooks * JavaScript * Mutable * * Hooks state * GC * Hooks * `useCallback` * props * `useEffect/useMemo/useCallback` * Vue Vue React Hooks [Hooks FAQ](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//zh-hans.reactjs.org/docs/hooks-faq.html%23from-classes-to-hooks) [ ](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//overreacted.io/zh-hans/a-complete-guide-to-useeffect/) **3.5 ** **3.5.1 ref reactive **
refreactive

---

``
```javascript
let arr = [3, 5, 7];
arr.foo = "hello";
//  arr [3,5,7,foo: 'hello']

for (let i in arr) {
  console.log(i); //  "0", "1", "2", "foo"
}

for (let i of arr) {
  console.log(i); //  "3", "5", "7"
}

//  for...of  "hello"

```
`for...in `
- JavaScript 
- 

`for...of `
-  ArrayMapSetarguments 
-  next() 

`Symbol.iterator`
-   for...of 
-  Symbol.iterator @@iterator 
```javascript
var myArray = [1,2,3];
var it = myArray[Symbol.iterator]();
```

 JS  Number  0  8  8 

 JS  10  10  10 
```javascript
// 0x  js 0xa == 10
var a = 0xa;
// 0  010 = 8
var b = 010;

// Number.parseInt radix  2~36
Number.parseInt(string,radix)
Number.parseInt('0101',2) // 5
Number.parseInt('0101',8) // 65

// Number.toString radix  2~36
Number.toString(radix)
(10).toString(2) //"1010"  2 
(10).toString(8) //"12"  8 
(10).toString(16) //"a"  16 
(1000).toString(36) //"rs"  36 
```
Post.content:
JS Number 0 8 8

JS 10 10 10
